suggest.smarty/smarty: Use this package to render Smarty views via SmartyView
suggest.nao-pon/elfinder-nightly: Use this package to integrate elFinder with MediaController
suggest.setasign/fpdi-fpdf: Use this package to generate PDF files
suggest.sybio/image-workshop: Use this package for image manipulations with GraphicsUtil

suggest.sybio/gif-creator: Use this package for image manipulations with GraphicsUtil
suggest.zf1/zend-http: Use this package, if you want to communicate to other wCMF instances over HTTP
